name: Down the Rabbit Hole (itch) (Lucas Ritchie-Shatz)
description:
A girl finds a book with the capability to kill.

Her body will rot away if she doesn't find the other two volumes in the series within a month.  A story about queer longing, eldritch horrors, and the absolute nightmare of growing up.

FEATURES

  • 30-45 minutes long
  • hyperonline queer kids
  • ooginess!

CONTENT WARNINGS

descriptions of gore, flashing lights, mental illness, queerphobia

-------

This is the culmination of work I've completed over 6 weeks for my senior project. Currently the story is still a work in progress and this version is only around the first act of the story but I hope to be able to finish it sometime soon!
